columns.name: Borough
columns.description: Borough in which the athletic facility is located.

columns.name: CEMSPermittable
columns.description: Indicates whether the Athoetic Facility is available for permitting through the Citywide Event Management System (CEMS)

columns.name: ClosureType
columns.description: Indicates the type of closure

columns.name: Dimensions
columns.description: The dimensions of the Athletic Facility

columns.name: EditDate
columns.description: Last edited date

columns.name: FieldNumber
columns.description: The number of the athletic facility, if a field has a physical sign with a number on it, this is that number, but not all fields have physical signs

columns.name: GISPropNum
columns.description: Unique identification number for the property the Athletic Facility is within

columns.name: Name
columns.description: The name of the Athletic Facility

columns.name: Nets/Rims/Goals Removed
columns.description: Indicates whether the nets, rims, or goals were removed from the facility

columns.name: OMPPropID
columns.description: Unique identification number for a property or portion of a property. In some cases – a standalone, smaller park for example – this number will be equivalent to the GIS Property Number. In other cases – a zone, playground or other site within a larger park – an additional designation of letters and/or numbers will be added.

columns.name: ParkDistrict
columns.description: Name of the Parks maintenance district that contains the Athletic Facility.

columns.name: PrimarySport
columns.description: The main usage sport for the athletic facility, the sport it was designed or is maintained for

columns.name: PropertyName
columns.description: The name of the property the Athletic Facility is within

top.item: Lincoln Terrace / Arthur S. Somers Park

columns.name: Red Sign Installed
columns.description: Indicates whether a red closed sign was installed

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Indicates whether the athletic facility is still active and open to the public, has been closed to observe COVID-19 social distancing, has been reopened following COVID-19 closure, or is under construction.

columns.name: SubPropertyName
columns.description: The Name of the subproperty (Zone or Playground) that the feature falls within

top.item: Lincoln Terr Pk/Arthur S Somers Zone 1

columns.name: SurfaceType
columns.description: The playing surface of the Athletic Facility

columns.name: System
columns.description: Internal unique identifier for the Athletic Facility

columns.name: Yellow Sign Removed
columns.description: Indicates whether a yellow sign dictating no group play was removed

columns.name: polygon
columns.description: Location (POLYGON) of athletic facility

columns.name: Approx Date Closed
columns.description: Approximate date Athletic Facility closed because of Covid

columns.name: Approx Date Reopened
columns.description: Date Athletic Facility reopened from Covid closure

columns.name: Approx Date Nets/Rims/Goals Added
columns.description: Indicates date of reinstallation of net, rim, or goal to an athletic facility

columns.name: Nets/Rims/Goals Added
columns.description: Indicates whether nets, rims, or goals were added back to an athletic facility

fields.name: Agency

view.description:
In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, NYC Parks temporarily closed several amenities, including Athletic Facilities (e.g. basketball courts, tennis courts, fields, etc.). This data collection contains the status of each Athletic Facility, and is subject to change. Although the data feed is refreshed daily, it may not reflect current conditions.

Data Dictionary:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aaYE82BS-SYh-xjI-t_oyJcNEPFWJNPfdI7T220-rv4/edit#gid=1499621902
view.emailShareUrl: mailto:?subject=Parks Closure Status Due to COVID-19: Athletic Facilities&body=Here is a dataset from NYC Open Data that I would like to share with you: https%3A%2F%2Fdata.cityofnewyork.us%2Fdataset%2FParks-Closure-Status-Due-to-COVID-19-Athletic-Faci%2Fg3xg-qtbc

Data Collection.Data Collection: NYC Parks Amenities Closure Status Due to COVID-19
